name: Death's Debt
description:
What happens when Death is low on his monthly soul collection quota?

"Death's Debt" is a free-roaming, first person human harvesting game where players experience (after)life as the Grim Reaper, who is informed that he is low on his soul collection quota and must slay as many unsuspecting humans as he possibly can.

Source Code-https://github.com/RileyWaldo/DeathsDebt/tree/master

Death's Debt - A Gamedev.tv Game Jam 2022 Submission By Code Cabana Games:

https://www.facebook.com/gaming/CodeCabanaGames

Riley Waldo (https://odalawa.itch.io/) - Programmer, Designer

Brendan Nothof (https://itch.io/profile/hiufigyo) - Programmer, Designer

Will Sanders (https://itch.io/profile/lucanthreus) - Designer

Connor Hegion (https://limparmsmcgee.itch.io/) - Music & Sound Design

Check out our next project, Exanimate!

Asset packs used to create Death's Debt: 

Alstra Infinite

Dark UI

ObstacleCoursePack

POLYGON City Pack

Simple Modular Human
